user.title: Your data
user.subtitle: This data is derived from your SPID or CIE. To change them, contact your digital identity provider.

empty.title: Your cart is empty
empty.description: Add one or more notices to your cart to proceed with payment

items.alert: The amount is updated automatically, so you always pay what is due and avoid penalties or other interest. <link1>Vuoi saperne di più?</link1>
items.full: You cannot add more than 5 notices to your cart
items.info: You can pay up to 5 notices together

assistance.title: How can we help you?
assistance.description: If you need assistance, you can open a support request.
assistance.cardDescription: Indicate the email address on which you wish to receive replies from support.
assistance.input1Helper: Please enter a valid email address
assistance.privacy: By continuing, you declare that you have read <link1> Privacy Policy </link1> of the citizen assistance service.
assistance.modalTitle: Do you really want to quit?
assistance.modalDescription: If you quit, the request for assistance will be lost.

IOAlert.title: Do you want to access your receipts and pay notices faster?

empty.title: Here you can see your pagoPA receipts
empty.subtitle: Pay a notice with any pagoPA-enabled channel.

preview.title: Search your pagoPA payment notices
preview.description: Here you can find the notices to be paid on your behalf that the Payee have communicated to us.

empty.title: We found no notices to pay
empty.description: If you have received a pagoPA notice, click on ‘Pay a notice’ and enter the data.

paidByMe.title: Here you will see receipts for payments made by you
paidByMe.text: If you paid by other channel, you should contact the payee to obtain a receipt.

ownedByMe.title: Here you can see receipts for payments made to you.
ownedByMe.text: Contact the payee if you cannot find a receipt.

paymentNotices.title: Your notices
paymentNotices.loading: We are searching through the archives of the Payee participating in the service...

bottomAlert.info: The payment notices have been communicated to us by the Payee. If you have any problems, please contact the institution.

noticesAlert.info: These are the notices that institutions have communicated to PagoPA. If you do not find a notice, contact the payee or click on ‘Pay a notice’ and enter the data.

optin.title: Do you allow PagoPA to search your notices?
optin.body: If you confirm, you allow PagoPA to search for payment notices in your name among the archives of the institutions participating in the service.

transactionDetail.title: Transaction detail
transactionDetail.noReceipt: The pagoPA receipt is not available. Contact the Payee if you need the payment receipt, i.e. the document certifying that a debt has been settled.
transactionDetail.totalLabel: The total includes {{fee}} commission charged by {{psp}}.

card2.title: How much and when to pay?

modal.title: Do you see a different amount?
modal.description: pagoPA automatically updates the amount to ensure that you have paid exactly what you owe and thus avoid penalties or other interest.

footer.legalInfo: Società per azioni con socio unico - capitale sociale di euro 1,000,000 interamente versato - sede legale in Roma, Piazza Colonna 370, CAP 00187 - N. di iscrizione a Registro Imprese di Roma, CF e P.IVA 15376371009

default.title: The page you are looking for does not exist
default.body: You can go back to the homepage or visit a new page

401.title: Your session has expired
401.body: Please log in to continue using the site.

403.title: It was not possible to access
403.body: The pagoPA private area is under development, access is currently not available.

408.title: It was not possible to access
408.body: A problem occurred while logging in. Please try again in a few minutes.

422.title: Sorry, we can't go ahead with the payment
422.body: For more information on the notice, contact the payee

423.title: We couldn't start the payment
423.body: Please try again in a few minutes
